3.name: Judith of Bethulia
3.description: A religious woman seeks to save her people from destruction by seducing and murdering the enemy leader, but her plans get complicated once she falls for him.

4.name: Tillie's Punctured Romance
4.description: A con man from the city dupes a wealthy country girl into marriage.

5.name: The Squaw Man
5.description: A chivalrous British officer takes the blame for his cousin's embezzlement and journeys to the American West to start a new life on a cattle ranch.

6.name: The Patchwork Girl of Oz

9.name: Cinderella
9.description: Though mistreated by her cruel stepmother and stepsisters, Cinderella is able to attend the royal ball through the help of a fairy godmother.

10.name: Tess of the Storm Country
10.description: A wealthy resident attempts to dispossess squatters who live near his home, which leads to a false accusation of murder.

13.name: The Life of General Villa
13.description: The life and career of Panccho Villa from young man to revolutionary leader is chronicled.

17.name: Home, Sweet Home
17.description: John Howard Payne at his most miserable point in life, writes a song which becomes popular and inspires other people at some point in their lives.

18.name: The Virginian
18.description: A good-natured but chivalrous cowboy romances the local schoolmarm and leads the posse that brings a gang of rustlers, which includes his best friend, to justice.

19.name: The Avenging Conscience: or 'Thou Shalt Not Kill'
19.description: Prevented from dating his sweetheart by his uncle, a young man turns his thoughts to murder.

20.name: Uncle Tom's Cabin
20.description: A black and white silent film based on Harriet Beecher Stowe's novel documenting the life and times of Uncle Tom.

21.name: A Florida Enchantment
21.description: A young woman discovers a seed that can make women act like men and men act like women. She decides to take one, then slips one to her maid and another to her fiancé. The fun begins.

24.name: The Exploits of Elaine
24.description: With the help of a private detective, Elaine tries to catch the masked criminal mastermind The Clutching Hand, who has murdered her father.

27.name: The Million Dollar Mystery
27.description: This twenty-three episode serial told the story of a secret society called The Black Hundred and its attempts to gain control of a lost million dollars.

28.name: The Spoilers
28.description: The first of many filmed adaptations of Rex Beach's adventure novel of the Alaskan gold-rush.

29.name: Der Hund von Baskerville
29.description: In this early version the classic "Hound of the Baskervilles" mystery is faithfully adapted, although Watson's character is absent. Holmes' foe is called Stapleton and he menaces Holmes' client Lord Henry and his fiancée, Laura Lyons.

33.name: Sealed Orders
33.description: On the brink of war, Lt. van Hauen is summoned to take command of the cruiser, but due to unforeseen events, he is wrongfully convicted as a traitor.

38.description: An American sailor falls in love with a fisherman's daughter and convinces her that Jesus is more powerful than the gods who have cursed her.

44.name: The Escape

50.name: Anna Karenina
50.description: A Russian silent film based on the eponymous novel by Leo Tolstoy. Anna Karenina is having an extramarital affair that causes her grave consequences.
